comments:
Build 3.2M4

Editing a manifest file, clicking on "Required Plug-ins", "Add ..." caused the following walkback:
Error 2006-01-17 11:48:56.545 java.lang.NullPointerException

Manifest file was:
Manifest-Version: 1.0
Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2
Bundle-Name: Harmony LUNI
Bundle-SymbolicName: org.apache.harmony.luni
Bundle-Version: 1.0.0
Bundle-ClassPath: .
Eclipse-JREBundle: true
Import-Package: com.ibm.io.nio,
 java.math,
 java.nio.charset,
 java.util.jar,
 java.util.regex,
 java.util.zip,
 java.security,
 java.text
Export-Package: com.ibm.misc.util,
 com.ibm.oti.util,

 com.ibm.oti.vm,
 java.io,
 java.lang,
 java.lang.ref,
 java.lang.reflect,
 java.net,
 java.util

Fixed.

The piece of code in question was making an assumption that the org.eclipse.osgi plug-in is either in the target or in the workspace.
*** Bug 123601 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
